item.title: I/O
item.description: Scanner Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in); int n = sc.nextInt(); long ln = sc.nextLong(); double dn = sc.nextDouble(); String s = sc.read(); //sc.readLine(); BufferedReader BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(System.in)); int n = Integer.parseInt(br.readLine()); int a[] = new int[n]; //n elements in one line StringTokenizer st = new StringTokenizer(br.readLine()); for(int i = 0; i < n; ++i){ a[i] = Integer.parseInt(st.nextToken()); } StreamTokenizer private static StreamTokenizer st; private static int nextInt() throws IOException{ st.
